title: The Hobbit - TV - 1977 - Music Soundtracks Including Dialogue
description:
This is the very hard to find dialog and soundtrack from "The Hobbit" animated feature by Rankin-Bass which was shown in 1977.

It includes the entire show in MP3 format, broken down into tracks matching the 2 LP set - these tracks include cover art and lyrics.

It also includes in MP3 format the "songs" album - also including cover art and lyrics.

Although I have spent considerable time in making this "really nice", much of the material comes from the web - I did have the original LPs to help me make it &#039;just right&#039;. It DOES include the sound version from the original presentation - i.e. with the sound effects intact.

Enjoy!
